subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Darren Helm scored 3 minutes 58 seconds into overtime to give the Detroit Red Wings a win over the Chicago Blackhawks, setting up a Stanley Cup finals rematch with Pittsburgh.
snippet: Darren Helm scored 3 minutes 58 seconds into overtime to give the Detroit Red Wings a win over the Chicago Blackhawks, setting up a Stanley Cup finals rematch with Pittsburgh.
